Package hu.bme.mit.theta.analysis.expr.refinement

Class JoiningPrecRefiner<S extends State,A extends Action,P extends Prec,R extends Refutation>

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.analysis.expr.refinement.JoiningPrecRefiner<S,A,P,R>
All Implemented Interfaces:
PrecRefiner<S,A,P,R>
public final class JoiningPrecRefiner<S extends State,A extends Action,P extends Prec,R extends Refutation> extends Object implements PrecRefiner<S,A,P,R>
A basic implementation of PrecRefiner that simply converts each element of the Refutation into a Precision and joins them.
